info.name: Product Ecosystem API Collection
info.description: Complete API collection for the Product Ecosystem backend. This collection includes all endpoints for authentication, user management, vendor operations, product management, order processing, and more.

item.name: üîê Authentication

request.description: Register a new user account. Role can be 'vendor' or 'superadmin'.
Login with email and password. Returns JWT token for authentication.
Logout current user and invalidate token.

item.description: Authentication endpoints for user registration, login, and token management.

item.name: üë• Users

request.description: Get all users with pagination (Super Admin only).

item.description: User management endpoints for profile operations and admin functions.

item.name: üè¢ Vendors

request.description: Get all vendors with pagination and search (Super Admin only).

body.raw:
{
  "name": "New Vendor Company",
  "email": "vendor@company.com",
  "phone": "+1234567890",
  "address": "123 Business St, City, State 12345",
  "contactPerson": "John Smith",
  "businessRegistration": "BR123456789",
  "taxId": "TX987654321"
}

request.description: Get vendor statistics and performance metrics.
Set vendor's invoice prefix (Super Admin only).

item.description: Vendor management endpoints for vendor operations and settings.

item.name: üì¶ Products

request.description: Get all products with filtering and pagination.
Search products by name, description, and filters.
Get products with low stock levels.

body.raw:
{
  "name": "New Smartphone",
  "description": "Latest model smartphone with advanced features",
  "price": 699.99,
  "costPrice": 450.00,
  "category": "electronics",
  "vendor": "{{vendorId}}",
  "stock": 50,
  "minStock": 10,
  "sku": "SM-001",
  "barcode": "1234567890123",
  "dimensions": {
    "length": 15.5,
    "width": 7.5,
    "height": 0.8,
    "weight": 0.18
  },
  "specifications": {
    "brand": "TechBrand",
    "model": "X-Pro",
    "color": "Black"
  },
  "tags": ["smartphone", "electronics", "mobile"]
}

request.description: Check if product has any order linkages before deletion.

item.description: Product management endpoints for inventory operations.

item.name: üõí Orders

request.description: Get all orders with filtering and pagination.
Add tracking information to order (Admin/Vendor only).

item.description: Order management endpoints for processing customer orders.

item.name: üìä Dashboard

request.description: Get admin dashboard data with system-wide metrics (Super Admin only).
Get vendor dashboard data with vendor-specific metrics (Vendor only).

item.description: Dashboard endpoints for analytics and key metrics.

item.name: üìÇ Categories
item.description: Category management endpoints for organizing products.

item.name: üìà Reports

request.description: Get sales report with date range and grouping options.

item.description: Reporting endpoints for sales and commission analytics.

item.name: üí∞ Commissions

request.description: Get all commissions with filtering (Super Admin only).
Get commissions for current vendor (Vendor only).
Get specific commission by ID (Super Admin only).
Generate commission for an order (Super Admin only).
Generate commissions for multiple orders (Super Admin only).
Approve commission for payment (Super Admin only).
Mark commission as paid (Super Admin only).

item.description: Commission management endpoints for vendor payouts.

item.name: üîî Notifications

request.description: Get all notifications with filtering and pagination.
Get all unread notifications for current user.
Get notification statistics for current user.
Mark all notifications as read for current user.

item.description: Notification management endpoints for real-time communication.

item.name: üè∑Ô∏è Barcodes (Admin Only)

request.description: Get all barcodes with pagination and filtering (Super Admin only).
Search barcodes by text, product, or vendor (Super Admin only).
Get barcode statistics and analytics (Super Admin only).
Generate barcode for a specific product (Super Admin only).
Generate barcodes for multiple products (Super Admin only).
Get barcode information for a specific product (Super Admin only).
Update barcode for a specific product (Super Admin only).
Regenerate barcode for a product (Super Admin only).
Get all products with barcodes for a specific vendor (Super Admin only).
Check if barcode is unique in the system (Super Admin only).
Get supported barcode formats and options (Super Admin only).
Generate barcode image for specific barcode text (Super Admin only).
Get barcode image for an existing product (Super Admin only).
Delete barcode for a specific product (Super Admin only).

item.description: Barcode management endpoints for product identification (Super Admin only).

request.description: Check API health status and basic information.
